description: Structured information on a file repository.

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifier (IRI) of this file repository.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.description: Stands for Internationalized Resource Identifier which is an internet protocol standard that builds on the URI protocol, extending the set of permitted characters to include Unicode/ISO 10646.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.label: Iri
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/IRI.name: IRI

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma._instruction: If file instances and bundles within the repository are organized and formatted according to a formal data structure use the appropriate contentType. Leave blank otherwise.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.description: Method of digitally organizing and structuring data or information.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.label: Format
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/forma.name: format

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash._instruction: Add the hash that was generated for this file repository.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash.description: Term used for the process of converting any data into a single value. Often also directly refers to the resulting single value.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash.label: Hash
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hash.name: hash

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hoste._instruction: Add the host of this file repository.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hoste.description: Reference to an organization that provides facilities and services for something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hoste.label: Hosted by
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/hoste.name: hostedBy

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name._instruction: Enter the name of this file repository.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.description: Word or phrase that constitutes the distinctive designation of a being or thing.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.label: Name
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/name.name: name

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repos._instruction: Add the type of this file repository.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repos.label: Repository type
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/repos.name: repositoryType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/stora._instruction: Enter the storage size this file repository allocates.
